bio:treatment.description: Plants not stoloniferous (not colonial or mat-forming). Stems (flowering): earliest leafless, later stems leafy, 15–35(–50) cm. Leaf blades deltate-ovate, bases abruptly cuneate to truncate or subcordate, faces minutely strigoso-hirsutulous (hairs ascending-appressed, 0.1–0.3 mm). Peduncles 2–22 cm. Outer phyllaries 6–11(–15) × 3–7 mm. 2n = 32.
Flowering late Mar–Jun(–Jul, later with moisture).
Moist to dry woodlands, forests, partially sunny sites, clearings, edges;
D.C., Ky., Md., N.Y., N.C., Ohio, Pa., S.C., Va., W.Va.
